data.title: Graphisoft Names Daniel Csillag As New CEO
data.meta_description: Daniel Csillag is now the new CEO of Graphisoft.
data.text:
Graphisoft announced that Daniel Csillag has been appointed CEO of the company as Huw Roberts, who has led the company since 2019, leaves his position by mutual agreement.

Csillag's experience

Csillag was part of the Nemetschek Group from 2017 to 2022 as CEO of Nevaris and general manager of Bluebeam, DACH region. During this time, he was also responsible for acquiring 123erfasst, the mobile cloud solution for data collection on construction sites. For the past two years, he was chief revenue officer at Thinkproject, a construction and asset management software provider.

Csillag started his career at Transtec and Bechtle, where he led international business activities. His first position as CEO was at Exact Software, a specialist in business software, including the construction sector. After the sale of Exact’s German business to Sage, he took on the positions of vice president of enterprise sales and managing director of the payroll and human resource divisions.

What people are saying

“With his industry expertise and many years of experience, Huw has played a key role in the success of Graphisoft in recent years,” says César Flores Rodríguez, chief division officer, planning & design and digital twin, at Nemetschek Group. “We thank Huw for his contribution and commitment to the Nemetschek Group and wish him all the best for the future.”
